'''''Beyond the Shadow of Time''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to touch 5 sets of 2 [[Mysterious Mural]]s each across the desert region and defeat the spawning mobs. The murals will be visible throughout the day, but can only be interacted with at night.
